summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the behavior of the MODFLOW 6 drain (DRN) package within the imod modeling framework, exercising discretization handling, conductance calculations, spatial clipping, concentration rendering, repeat stress functionality, validation checks, and output writing.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and robustness of the MF6 drain implementation used in groundwater modeling workflows, ensuring reliable simulation results and proper integration with the imod suite.
